description: Uses the path system as a circuit course. Can easily be repeated for multiple laps. Total length of 7.8 km. Don't try to ride during the day during golfing season. Please stay STRICTLY on the pavement.
directions: Taking Highway 3 to Coaldale, turn south on LandOLakes Drive (turn south at Tim Hortons). then turn south on 24th St. This course starts at the NE corner of the Golf Course.
title: LandOLakes
